comments: Valanciunas (MEM) establishes himself in a screening position in the path of Schroder (OKC) and gives him room to avoid the contact.
RLS and RAR show Schroder (OKC) makes contact with Wright's (MEM) arm at the start of the drive but the contact is marginal and Wright is able to maintain his dribble and drive.
Adams (OKC) maintains a legal guarding position during the driving shot attempt by Wright (MEM) as he has a resting forearm to his side and does not deliver contact.
Holiday (MEM) maintains a legal guarding position during the driving shot attempt by Schroder (OKC).
[Observable in enhanced video] Wright (MEM) splits his feet.
Valanciunas (MEM) establishes himself in a screening position in the path of Schroder (OKC) and gives him room to avoid the contact.
Wright (MEM) maintains a legal guarding position on Schroder (OKC) and makes clean ball contact on his steal attempt.
Bradley (MEM) maintains a legal guarding position on Schroder (OKC) at the end of the drive and makes clean ball contact on his steal attempt.
PXP and LLS show Ferguson (OKC) makes marginal contact with Bradley (MEM) off ball as he comes off the screen and it does not cause him to fall to the floor.
Adams (OKC) maintains a legal guarding position on Valanciunas (MEM) off ball in the post.
Grant (OKC) maintains a legal guarding position on Holiday (MEM) during the drive.
Caboclo (MEM) establishes himself in a screening position in the path of Westbrook (OKC) and he does not deliver contact during the switch.
Valanciunas (MEM) is in the lane for less than three seconds when the shot is imminent.
Valanciunas (MEM) and Adams (OKC) engage and separate during the rebound and the contact to the back of Adams is marginal.
Adams (OKC) establishes himself in a screening position in the path of Wright (MEM) and absorbs the contact.
Valanciunas (MEM) and Adams (OKC) make incidental foot to foot contact as they position for the possible rebound.
Ferguson (OKC) briefly has an arm around Valanciunas (MEM) during the screen but the contact is tactile and does not affect his SQBR.
Valanciunas (MEM) establishes himself in a screening position in the path of Ferguson (OKC) and gives him room to avoid the contact.
LAR and PXP show during the rebound, Adams (OKC) briefly grasps the jersey of Valanciunas (MEM) but the contact does not affect his ability to go for the rebound.
Wright (MEM) commits a take foul on Schroder (OKC).
Wright (MEM) commits a take foul on Ferguson (OKC).
